items.summary: arXiv:2601.14288v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We present \textbf{DeepInflation}, an AI agent designed for research and model discovery in inflationary cosmology. Built upon a multi-agent architecture, \textbf{DeepInflation} integrates Large Language Models (LLMs) with a symboli…

items.title: Sample-efficient non-Gaussian noise reduction in gravitational wave data via learnable wavelets
items.summary: arXiv:2601.14326v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We introduce $\texttt{WaveletNet}$, a wavelet-based neural network architecture to identify and reduce non-Gaussian noise in gravitational wave data. Traditionally, convolutional neural networks (CNNs) have been widely used as a fle…
